title: Provided that out of amount so recovered as Infrastructural charges, 90% amount will go to MCGM and 10% amount will remain with SRA
clause_text: Provided that out of amount so recovered as Infrastructural charges, 90% amount will go to MCGM and 10% amount will remain with SRA. This provision shall not apply to the plots wherein permissible Zonal
section: Payments to be made to SRA and Instalments:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided that out of amount so recovered as Infrastructural charges, 90% amount will go to MCGM and 10% amount will remain with SRA.
